snippet.title: THE LONGING Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
THE LONGING is a unique, ultra-slow idle adventure, coming to STEAM in early 2020.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/893850/THE_LONGING/
In utter loneliness, miles below the surface, it is your only task to... wait. For 400 days...

Official Website:
http://www.399d-23h-59m-59s.com/

Studio Seufz:
http://www.studioseufz.com/

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/studioseufz

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/AnselmPyta

Supported by the MFG Baden-Württemberg.
Based on a project at the Filmakademie Baden-Württemberg.
www.animationsinstitut.de





WAIT


...
